description: The AmazonBasics mini travel Stand travel stand for tablets and e-readers is the perfect solution to watch movies, read books, magazines or recipes, surf the web, view photos and more on your device hands free. The compact, ultra-portable stand holds popular tablets and e-Readers including the Kindle Fire, Apple iPad, iPad 2, Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 and 7.0, Kindle Keyboard, Kindle Touch and Kindle (latest generation). The stand conveniently folds up and snaps shut when not in use.
title: AmazonBasics Mini Travel Stand for Tablets and e-Readers including iPad 4, iPad 2, Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 and 7.0, Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD, and Kindle Touch (Black)
